General.Name: BPL Limited
General.Description: BPL Limited manufactures and sells electronic products primarily in India. The company offers LED televisions, refrigerators, air conditioners, washing machines, small kitchen appliances, LED lighting devices, fans, geysers, and audio products, as well as personal care products. It also offers medical electronic and printed circuit boards components. The company provides its products under the BPL brand name. BPL Limited was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
